dmca.title: [ABUSE] Hosting of ocm.sg
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2006 8:07 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Hosting of ocm.sg

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Monday, March 13, 2006
at
20:55:39 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Hosting of ocm.sg

MESSAGE BODY:
Dear sir/madam,

 

My name is Tiong Choon and I am an Information Security Officer with DBS
Bank Ltd, a bank headquartered in Singapore.

 

We noticed that a website (http://www.dbs.ocm.sg) resolvable to the IP
address 67.18.216.114 is using our copyrighted information without our
consent. Can you kindly assist?

 

 

Regards,

 

Tiong Choon



CONFIDENTIAL NOTE: The information contained in this email is intended only
for the use of the individual or entity named above and may contain
information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure
under applicable law. If the reader of this message is not the intended
recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or
copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received
this message in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete the
mail.
Thank you.
